name: seo-improvements
description: SEO improvement tools for Designed For You website

scripts.seo-optimize: npm run metadata-optimize && npm run content-optimize
scripts.seo-fix: npm run seo-optimize && npm run seo-audit
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html assets public styles src components seo-report dist/ && npm run seo-optimize && node generate-sitemap.js && cp sitemap.xml robots.txt dist/ && npm run dist-audit
